languages.text: Однако в беззаконии, воцарившемся в Просторе, имперская грамота стала мишенью на спине капера. Его череп и сердце были принесены в жертву темным божествам варпа.
Yet amidst the lawlessness that came to rule the Expanse, that title became a target on the privateer's back. His skull and heart were offered as a sacrifice to the Dark Gods of the warp.
languages.original_text: Однако в беззаконии, воцарившемся в Просторе, имперская грамота стала мишенью на спине капера. Его череп и сердце были принесены в жертву темным божествам варпа.

traits.locale_text: Yet in the impiety that took the crown in the Expanse, the Imperium certificate turned into a target on the privateer's back. His scull and heart were offered as a sacrifice to the dark deities of warp.

Yet in the impiety that took the crown in the Expanse, the Imperium certificate turned into a target on the privateer's back. His scull and heart were offered as a sacrifice to the dark deities of warp.
Yet amidst the lawlessness that came to rule the Expanse, that title became a target on the privateer's back. His skull and heart were offered as a sacrifice to the dark gods of the warp.

Yet amidst the lawlessness that came to rule the Expanse, that title became a target on the privateer's back. His skull and heart were offered as a sacrifice to the Dark Gods of the warp.

languages.text: 然而，当科罗努斯扩区陷入混乱之后，这个头衔就变成了一个大大的靶子，挂在这个私掠者背后。最终，他的头骨和心脏被挖了出来，作为祭品献给了亚空间的黑暗诸神。
languages.original_text: Yet amidst the lawlessness that came to rule the Expanse, that title became a target on the privateer's back. His skull and heart were offered as a sacrifice to the Dark Gods of the warp.

traits.locale_text: 然而，当科罗努斯扩区陷入混乱之后，这个头衔就变成了一个大大的靶子，挂在这个私掠者背后。最终，他的头骨和心脏被挖了出来，作为祭品献给了亚空间的黑暗诸神。

languages.text: Doch in der Gesetzlosigkeit, die in der Ausdehnung inzwischen herrschte, wurde dieser Titel zu einer Zielscheibe auf dem Rücken des Freibeuters. Sein Schädel und sein Herz wurden den Dunklen Göttern des Warp als Opfer dargeboten.
languages.original_text: Yet amidst the lawlessness that came to rule the Expanse, that title became a target on the privateer's back. His skull and heart were offered as a sacrifice to the Dark Gods of the warp.

traits.locale_text: Doch in der Gesetzlosigkeit, die in der Ausdehnung inzwischen herrschte, wurde dieser Titel zu einer Zielscheibe auf dem Rücken des Freibeuters. Sein Schädel und sein Herz wurden den Dunklen Göttern des Warp als Opfer dargeboten.

languages.text: Cependant, dans le chaos qui régnait désormais en maître à travers les Étendues, ce titre devint comme une cible sur son dos. Son crâne et son cœur furent offerts en sacrifice aux Dieux Sombres du Warp.
languages.original_text: Yet amidst the lawlessness that came to rule the Expanse, that title became a target on the privateer's back. His skull and heart were offered as a sacrifice to the Dark Gods of the warp.

traits.locale_text: Cependant, dans le chaos qui régnait désormais en maître à travers les Étendues, ce titre devint comme une cible sur son dos. Son crâne et son cœur furent offerts en sacrifice aux Dieux Sombres du Warp.

languages.text: Sin embargo, entre la anarquía que acabó reinando en la Extensión, el título se convirtió en una diana en la espalda del corsario. Su cráneo y su corazón se ofrecieron como sacrificio a los Dioses Oscuros de la disformidad.
languages.original_text: Yet amidst the lawlessness that came to rule the Expanse, that title became a target on the privateer's back. His skull and heart were offered as a sacrifice to the Dark Gods of the warp.

traits.locale_text: Sin embargo, entre la anarquía que acabó reinando en la Extensión, el título se convirtió en una diana en la espalda del corsario. Su cráneo y su corazón se ofrecieron como sacrificio a los Dioses Oscuros de la disformidad.

languages.text: しかし、エクスパンスを支配するようになった無法の中で、その称号は私掠船長の背後に掲げられた標的となった。彼の頭蓋骨と心臓は、歪みの暗黒神への生け贄として捧げられた。
languages.original_text: Yet amidst the lawlessness that came to rule the Expanse, that title became a target on the privateer's back. His skull and heart were offered as a sacrifice to the Dark Gods of the warp.

traits.locale_text: しかし、エクスパンスを支配するようになった無法の中で、その称号は私掠船長の背後に掲げられた標的となった。彼の頭蓋骨と心臓は、歪みの暗黒神への生け贄として捧げられた。

languages.text: Ancak Enginlik'e hâkim olan kanunsuzluk nedeniyle bu sıfat, korsanı açık hedef yaptı. Kafatası ve kalbi, öteboyutun kara tanrılarına kurban olarak adandı.
languages.original_text: Yet amidst the lawlessness that came to rule the Expanse, that title became a target on the privateer's back. His skull and heart were offered as a sacrifice to the Dark Gods of the warp.

traits.locale_text: Ancak Enginlik'e hâkim olan kanunsuzluk nedeniyle bu sıfat, korsanı açık bir hedef hâline getirdi. Kafatası ve kalbi, öteboyutun karanlık tanrılarına kurban olarak adandı.
